meanings.sent1: The beachiest sandcastle stood tall on the shore.
meanings.sent2: The beachiest spot to relax is under the palm tree.
meanings.sent3: She always wears the beachiest sunglasses, even in winter.
meanings.sent4: The beachiest day of the year was spent surfing the waves.
meanings.sent5: The beachiest seashells were collected in a vibrant pail.

meanings.sent1: Her beachiest memories were of building sandcastles.
meanings.sent2: The beachiest colors in the painting were shades of blue.
meanings.sent3: He wore the beachiest outfit to the formal event, causing a stir.
meanings.sent4: The beachiest breeze carried the scent of salt and sunscreen.
meanings.sent5: The beachiest sound was the crashing of the waves against the shore.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities of a beach.
meanings.sent1: The beachiest towel was soft and sand-resistant.
meanings.sent2: The beachiest music playlist included tropical tunes.
meanings.sent3: The beachiest attitude meant being carefree and relaxed.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and inviting as the beachiest sunset.
meanings.sent5: The beachiest feeling was the cool water lapping at her feet.
